recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Chicken Manchow Soup
ingredients: 1 Cup cooked chicken pieces4 cups chicken stock1 tsp ginger, finely chopped1 tsp garlic, finely chopped1 tsp green chilies, finely chopped1 tbsp coriander leaves, finely chopped2 tbsp French beans, finely chopped2 tbsp carrots, finely chopped2 tbsp cabbage, finely chopped2 tbsp capsicum, finely chopped2 tbsp mushrooms, finely chopped2 spring onions, finely chopped1 tsp pepper1 tbsp soya sauce2 tbsp cornflour mixed with 1 cup water2 spring onion stems3 tbsp oilsalt (as required)
recipes.method: In a pan, stir fry the ginger, garlic, coriander leaves and green chilies for about 2 minutes.2.Add all the vegetables, pepper and salt and continue to stir-fry for 2 more minutes.3.Add the cooked chicken to the vegetable mixture and mix well. Add the soy sauce, chicken stock and salt.4.Let it boil, reduce the heat and add the cornflour mixed with water and stir constantly till it thickens slightly.5.Remove from heat and serve immediately.6.Garnish with spring onion stems.

recipes.title: Protein PanCakes
ingredients: salt, sugar, vanilla essence as per requirement
recipes.method: mix every ingredient mentioned above in mixer and then take the batter and put it on pan and cook
